metadata.author: Pai et al.
metadata.description: Induces complete, functional eye formation in non-neural tissue by establishing a hyperpolarized eye-field prepattern.

bioelectric_state.notes: Requires establishing a hyperpolarized domain mimicking the natural Anterior Neural Field.

control_loop.monitoring_frequency: Every 6 hours from Stage 10.5 to Stage 24

feedback_mechanism.corrective_action: If drift above -25mV: Apply booster injection of 0.5 ng Kv1.5 mRNA. If drift below -55mV: Allow endogenous depolarization for 2 hours.

termination_criteria.anatomical_marker: Formation of optic cup (Stage 24) with visible lens placode

delivery_method.timing: 4-cell stage (NF Stage 3), target ventral blastomere V1

hardware_drivers.name: Kv1.5
hardware_drivers.dosage: 1-2 ng per blastomere (initial), 0.5 ng (booster if needed)

metadata.author: Adams et al.
metadata.description: Rescues tail regeneration in non-regenerative contexts by driving proton efflux.

bioelectric_state.notes: Relies on H+ pumping to drive Vmem change.

control_loop.monitoring_frequency: Every 4 hours for first 24h, then every 12 hours

feedback_mechanism.corrective_action: If drift above +5mV: Allow homeostatic correction. If below -25mV: Apply secondary mRNA.

termination_criteria.bioelectric_marker: Regeneration bud returns to baseline (-15 to -20mV)

metadata.author: Emmons-Bell et al.
metadata.description: Induces head morphologies of other species by altering gap junction connectivity.
references: Emmons-Bell et al., 2015, Int. J. Mol. Sci. 16:26065-26087

bioelectric_state.notes: Network topology state via gap junction blockade.

feedback_mechanism.corrective_action: Gap junction blockade is transient; drift is expected.

termination_criteria.anatomical_marker: Head shape matches target species morphology

delivery_method.notes: Bath application is systemic by nature.

metadata.author: Tseng et al.
metadata.description: Induces leg regeneration in post-metamorphic frogs.

bioelectric_state.notes: Intracellular sodium modulation triggers MSX1 expression.

control_loop.monitoring_frequency: Every 8 hours for first 48h, then every 24 hours

feedback_mechanism.corrective_action: If above -5mV: Reduce ionophore. If below -35mV: Apply secondary pulse.

termination_criteria.bioelectric_marker: Stump returns to resting potential (-20 to -25mV)

delivery_method.notes: Slow-release bead provides sustained local delivery.

hardware_drivers.name: Monensin Cocktail
hardware_drivers.dosage: 10 mM stock, 50 μL applied to bead
